text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The response explicitly addresses the unitary risk of the EUTM under the 'EUTM \u2014 Cons / Risks' section, stating: 'if there\u2019s a successful objection/opposition/invalidity based on rights in *any* EU country, the **whole EUTM can be refused/cancelled**'. This directly satisfies the criterion regarding the unitary risk where a successful opposition in a single member state can cause the entire application to fail.", "criterion_id": "6a8aefcc-2c31-4875-a0b5-35b56ce837f0"}
